PRE_SCREENING_QUESTIONS.TITLE: Pre-Screening Questions
PRE_SCREENING_QUESTIONS.GENDER: What is your sex at birth

EXAM_QUESTIONS.TITLE: Exam Questions
EXAM_QUESTIONS.MRI_HISTORY: Have you ever had an MRI before
EXAM_QUESTIONS.PROBLEM_DURING_MRI: Did you experience any problems during the MRI
EXAM_QUESTIONS.ANY_MEDICAL_CONDITION: Do you currently have any medical conditions that prevent you from staying completely still during the exam
EXAM_QUESTIONS.HOBBY_OR_JOB: Have you EVER worked With metal In your entire life As a hobby Or job
EXAM_QUESTIONS.CLEARANCE_AUTHORIZATION_REPORT: Have you had an MRI performed before And have a clearance authorization/XRAY report
EXAM_QUESTIONS.INJURIES_IN_EYES: Have you ever had any injuries to your eyes
EXAM_QUESTIONS.PHYSICAL_LIMITATION: Any physical limitation such as  a cane, walker or wheelchair
EXAM_QUESTIONS.TRANSFER_ONTO_MRI_TABLE: Are you able to transfer yourself onto the MRI table
EXAM_QUESTIONS.MEDICAL_DEVICES_ON_BODY: Do you have ANY medical devices implanted in your body
EXAM_QUESTIONS.FOREIGN_METAL_OBJECT_ON_BODY: Do you have any foreign metal objects such as a bullet, a BB/Pellet or shrapnel in your body
EXAM_QUESTIONS.WEAR_WIG_OR_NOT: Do you wear a wig or hair implants
EXAM_QUESTIONS.REMOVABLE_METAL_IN_MOUTH: Do you have removable metal in your mouth or braces
EXAM_QUESTIONS.RECENT_TATTOO: Do you have any recent tattoos that are less than 6 weeks old
EXAM_QUESTIONS.ANCKLE_MONITOR_DEVICE: Do you have an ankle monitor device
EXAM_QUESTIONS.ABLE_TO_REMOVE_DEVICE_BEFORE_PROCEDURE: Are you able to remove the device before the procedure
EXAM_QUESTIONS.PO_MEET_YOU_AT_FACILITY: Can your PO meet you at the facility to remove it while you are scanned
EXAM_QUESTIONS.DIABITIC_HISTORY: Do you have diabetes or a history of diabetes
EXAM_QUESTIONS.CANCER_HISTORY: Do you have cancer or a history of cancer
EXAM_QUESTIONS.HAVE_BLOOD_PRESSURE: Do you have high blood pressure
EXAM_QUESTIONS.ALLERGIES_OR_ADVERSE_REACTION_TO_MEDICIN: Do you have allergies or adverse reactions to medications
EXAM_QUESTIONS.KIDNEY_PROBLEM: Do you have kidney problems or issues

EXAM_QUESTIONS_FOR_CT_OR_CR.TITLE: Exam Questions
EXAM_QUESTIONS_FOR_CT_OR_CR.RECENT_XRAY_PERFORMED: Have you had a recent X-ray or CT performed
EXAM_QUESTIONS_FOR_CT_OR_CR.CANCER_HISTORY: Do you have cancer or any history of cancer
